statements: SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, emails_sent, emails_opened, click_throughs, conversions, revenue FROM email_campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_name, revenue, emails_opened, click_throughs, conversions, emails_sent, campaign_id FROM email_campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_name, emails_sent, revenue FROM email_campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, click_throughs, conversions FROM email_campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, revenue FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE emails_sent > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC, campaign_id ASC
SELECT campaign_name, click_throughs FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 50 ORDER BY click_throughs DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, emails_opened FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE revenue > 5000 ORDER BY emails_opened ASC
SELECT * FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 10 AND emails_sent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, conversions, revenue FROM email_campaign_performance WHERE emails_opened < emails_sent AND click_throughs > 100 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, total_sent FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_sent > 1000;
SELECT metric_id, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM campaign_metrics;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, total_sent FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_sent, conversion_rate FROM email_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, total_sent, revenue_generated FROM email_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id WHERE total_sent > 10000;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, open_rate, click_through_rate, conversion_rate, revenue_generated FROM email_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_recipients WHERE subscribed_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT recipient_id, email, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM email_recipients;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM email_recipients WHERE subscribed_date >= '2021-06-01' AND subscribed_date <= '2021-12-31';

SELECT campaign_name, delivered_emails, opened_emails, clicked_emails, conversion_rate FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE cr.delivered_emails > 1000 AND cr.click_through_rate > 0.1;

SELECT c.campaign_name, cr.delivered_emails, cr.opened_emails, cr.clicked_emails, cr.conversion_rate FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE c.status = 'active' AND cr.conversion_rate >= 0.05 ORDER BY cr.conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, total_emails FROM EmailCampaigns ORDER BY total_emails DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmailOpens WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT click_date, click_link FROM EmailClicks WHERE email_id = 456 ORDER BY click_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, roi FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT * FROM EmailOpens WHERE open_location = 'USA';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, successful_emails FROM EmailCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT conversion_id, email_id, conversion_date, user_id FROM EmailConversions WHERE conversion_value > 100 ORDER BY conversion_date ASC;
SELECT EmailCampaigns.campaign_name, EmailOpens.open_date, EmailOpens.open_location FROM EmailCampaigns INNER JOIN EmailOpens ON EmailCampaigns.campaign_id = EmailOpens.email_id;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_opened > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, total_sent, total_clicked FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_clicked > total_sent * 0.2;
SELECT recipient_name, email_address FROM email_recipients ORDER BY recipient_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_opened, total_clicked FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_sent, total_opened, total_clicked FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_sent > 1000 AND total_opened < total_clicked;

SELECT email_address, recipient_name, campaign_name, click_date FROM email_recipients JOIN email_clicks ON email_recipients.id = email_clicks.recipient_id JOIN email_campaigns ON email_clicks.campaign_id = email_campaigns.id ORDER BY click_date ASC;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(DISTINCT recipient_id) AS total_conversions, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM email_campaigns LEFT JOIN email_conversions ON email_campaigns.id = email_conversions.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
